welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Binondo, the vibrant heart of Manila known for its rich history, delicious food, and bustling streets. We invite you to immerse yourself in its charm, explore its alleys, and savor its unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves international and domestic flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights for Cebu Pacific, PAL Express, and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for small regional airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Baler Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Password can be obtained at the information desk.
